input.sentences: the old ruins had many secrets .
archaeologists have dug up many neat things .
they found old tools for mashing things .
and they also found old coins .
this is an example of ancient pottery .
output.sentences: The newly opened ruins were a source of fascination and amazement.
The group of archaeologists explored every nook and cranny.
They found many revealing relics and pored over them closely.
They also found ancient coins, which were a new discovery for them.
Surprisingly, the archaeologists also discovered unbroken pottery, vases and urns.
